segments.text: I'm looking at the left side of the kitchen now, where the children are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Thereâ€™s a boy, quite young, balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into an open cabinet where a "COOKIE JAR" is visible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is right in there, pulling out cookies, I presume.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a clever little rascal, trying to sneak treats like that!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable, though, it's really tilted backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see his sister, or another child, standing nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's looking up at him, hand raised, clearly expecting a share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their mission, completely ignoring the adult.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic secret operation, executed with surprising coordination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope the stool holds, or someone is going to get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is teetering on the edge of chaos, literally.
segments.speaker: PAR
